channel.title: Rocklin & Roseville Today
channel.description: Rocklin and Roseville California Online Newspaper

item.title: Downtown Roseville Free Wi-Fi in Town Square
item.description: In time for event season, visitors to the area around the Vernon Street Town Square in Downtown Roseville will now be able to connect to the internet via a free wireless network

item.title: Top 100 Paying Jobs in California (Part 3)
item.description: Part 3: Pair up a great paying job with one that matches your lifestyle and enjoy the best of both worlds.

item.title: California Ranks Dead Last in Gas Price Relief
item.description: When it comes to gas price relief, California ranks dead last versus last year according to Gas Buddy's recent report.

item.title: Honda Civic: A Very Smart Buy
item.description: Much like its bigger brother - the Accord - the Honda Civic is no longer undisputed king of the hill.

item.title: Auburn Arts Commission Seeks Project Applicants
item.description: The Auburn Arts Commission recently announced a Call to Artists to submit an application for consideration to paint a utility box in the City of Auburn.

item.title: Police Operation Targets Adults Buying Alcohol for Minors
item.description: So far, there have been 412 citations and arrests during a major effort to help reduce youth access to alcohol and also make the streets safer

item.title: Rocklin Crime Report Digest Update (3-16-15)
item.description: Rocklin weekly crime reported update digest for the period of March 2-8, 2015.

item.title: Golf Instructor Keeps Swinging at 78
item.description: At the age of 78 and on the surface, at least, Ed Koepp seems to have gone through life effortlessly and has accomplished much.

item.title: Nonprofit Leadership Summit March 20th in Lincoln
item.description: Placer Community Foundation's (PCF) Fifth Annual Nonprofit Leadership Summit will take place on Friday, March 20th.

item.title: Barbara Besana Appointed KidsFirst Executive Director
item.description: Every once in a while losing something is a good thing. Just ask KidsFirst's Barbara Besana

item.title: Toyota Amphitheatre Concert Series in Wheatland
item.description: The Toyota Amphitheatre in Wheatland, formerly known as Sleep Train Amphitheatre presents their 2015 summer concert series.

item.title: 50 Days of the Dead: Here Comes Sunshine
item.description: The Dead performing Here Comes Sunshine at the Curtis Hixon Convention Center in Tampa, Florida on December 19, 1973.

item.title: Declare All Weeds a Public Nuisance: Roseville Fire Officials
item.description: Roseville Fire Officials are recommending that the Roseville City Council declare all weeds, dirt, rubbish and rank growths within city limits a public nuisance

item.title: Roseville Looks to Upgrade Phone Recording Software
item.description: The City of Roseville looks to upgrade the city's phone recording software at a cost of over $24,000 with an option of maintenance at approximately $13,000

item.title: New Energy Efficiency Standards for Computers Proposed
item.description: Today the California Energy Commission (CEC) made public new proposed energy efficiency standards for computers, monitors and displays

item.title: Top 100 Paying Jobs in California (Part 2)
item.description: The Top 100 Paying Jobs in California part 2.

item.title: Palm Desert: Spring Break for the Family
item.description: A few years back, our family stumbled upon Palm Desert for the first time. We loved it and it has become a regular landing spot for our desert adventures

item.title: Roseville Crime Report Digest Update (3.11.15)
item.description: Revised: March 13, 2015 - Roseville weekly crime report digest for March 11, 2015.

item.title: Placer County Supervisor Jennifer Montgomery Honored
item.description: Placer County Supervisor Jennifer Montgomery is among 24 women elected officials nationwide recognized this year by a new program created to highlight outstanding contributions by women

item.title: Top 100 Paying Jobs in California (Part 1)
item.description: Some believe the best path to career fulfillment is by finding a job that matches your lifestyle, others believe it is all about the cash.
